Description: WBS Development - Define 6 major phases and Level 2/3 breakdown (50-150 activities)
Notes: Scheduler: ~8 hrs for WBS structure per typical Design-Build phasing

Description: Duration Assignment - Research and assign durations to all activities using historical benchmarks
Notes: Scheduler: ~0.1 hrs per activity for 100 activities + benchmarking research

Description: Dependency Logic - Establish predecessor/successor relationships and sequencing
Notes: Scheduler: dependency mapping for CPM schedule

Description: Critical Path Analysis - Calculate and verify critical path in scheduling software
Notes: Scheduler: CPM calculation and verification

Description: Gantt Chart Production - Format and export detailed schedule to PDF
Notes: Scheduler: visual formatting and export for proposal

Description: Milestone Summary - Extract and document 12-15 key milestones with target dates and float
Notes: Scheduler: milestone extraction and table formatting

Description: Critical Path Narrative - Draft 1-2 page narrative explaining critical path and float management
Notes: Scheduler: technical writing for critical path explanation

Description: Schedule Assumptions Document - Compile weather/permitting/procurement/commissioning assumptions
Notes: Scheduler: consolidate all assumptions from Steps 2-5 per Procedure

Description: Addendum 03 Integration - Document survey post-award constraint and pickled sand removal impacts
Notes: Scheduler: addenda compliance documentation per REQ-SCH-009

Description: Coordination with DEL-05-01/02 (Pricing) - Align schedule duration with general conditions and escalation
Notes: Technical Lead + Estimator coordination per REQ-SCH-010

Description: Coordination with DEL-04-01 (Construction Methodology) - Verify sequencing alignment
Notes: Technical Lead + Construction Manager coordination

Description: Coordination with DEL-06-01 (Commissioning Narrative) - Verify commissioning phase duration
Notes: Technical Lead + Commissioning Lead coordination per REQ-SCH-005

Description: Coordination with DEL-09-01 (Risk Register) - Align schedule buffers with identified risks
Notes: Technical Lead + Risk Manager coordination per REQ-SCH-011

Description: Coordination with DEL-02-01 (Concept Design) - Verify scope alignment
Notes: Technical Lead + Architect scope verification per F-003

Description: Internal QA Peer Review - Duration reasonableness check against historical norms (per REQ-SCH-002)
Notes: Senior Scheduler/PM peer review per X-002

Description: Dependency Logic Verification - Peer review of CPM logic per D-004 requirement
Notes: Senior Scheduler verification per Step 4.4a

Description: Specification Compliance Check - Verify REQ-SCH-000 through REQ-SCH-012
Notes: Senior PM verification of all specification requirements

Description: Final Review and Sign-off - Proposal Manager approval before submission
Notes: Final gatekeeping sign-off per Step 10

Description: Revisions and Rework - Address peer review comments and coordination feedback
Notes: Estimated 20% of development effort for revisions

Description: Contingency - 15% of base estimate for uncertainty
Notes: PCT_BY_BUCKET method at 15% of CAD 9750 base
